Episodes.Title: Rumble
Episodes.Plot: The beating death of a stockbroker causes a battle of epic proportions between the victim's family and the faction responsible for his death.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.

Episodes.Title: Challenged
Episodes.Plot: A mentally challenged man is reunited with the mother who gave him away after his brother is killed.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.

Episodes.Title: Lost Boys
Episodes.Plot: A young woman (Jena Malone) escapes from a polygamous cult.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jena Malone, Tolan Aman, Colton Parsons, Colm Meaney

Episodes.Title: Falling
Episodes.Plot: The detectives investigate the mystery of a falling construction crane in the city and that leads them to something much more sinister.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ruby Jerins (Lacey Talbot), Michael Kelly (Gary Talbot), Ed Moran (Carl Nolan), Geraldine Hughes (Sandra Talbot), Frank Converse (Wayne Hardy), Greg McFadden (Dr. Connor Dunning)

Episodes.Title: Knock Off
Episodes.Plot: A revered sheriff becomes a possible conspirator in a case involving a murdered tourist.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.

Episodes.Title: Sweetie
Episodes.Plot: Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate when the writer of a bestselling memoir is found dead in a community of male prostitutes.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
Episodes.GuestStars: Taylor Gildersleeve, Heather Matarazzo, Vivica Fox

Episodes.Title: Zero
Episodes.Plot: Cutter is determined to expose misconduct when he realizes an old friend working in the system is obstructing justice in the murder of an environmentalist.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ned Beatty, Sherry Stringfield, Leah Curney

Episodes.Title: Chattel
Episodes.Plot: While investigating the murder of two divorce lawyers, detectives Lupo and Bernard uncover a child slave trade ring.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul DeBoy, Maureen Silliman, Mary Beth O'Connor, Steven Friedman, Tom Gilroy, Jessica Hecht, Thuliso Dingwall

Episodes.Title: By Perjury
Episodes.Plot: The murder of the plaintiff in a high-profile lawsuit against a major airline leads detectives to a defense attorney (Dallas Roberts) who is willing to do whatever it takes to ensure his big payday.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Harriett D. Foy, Adam Mastrelli, Dallas Roberts, Mercedes Ruehl

Episodes.Title: Pledge
Episodes.Plot: When the son and housekeeper of a pair of prominent biologists are murdered, detectives suspect the couple's work on a controversial pharmaceutical study may have made them targets for the killer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Malloy, Erin Dilly, Stephen Kunken

Episodes.Title: Lucky Stiff
Episodes.Plot: The owner of a trucking company, Vic Russell, is found dead after a business meeting; detectives uncover information that leads them to believe that Russell had ties to the Russian mob.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Grupper, Michael Aranov, Robert Iler

Episodes.Title: Illegitimate
Episodes.Plot: An NYPD officer kills a troubled fellow officer who took hostages at gunpoint; detectives Lupo and Bernard find valuable stolen documents and a dead body at the man's apartment.

Episodes.Title: Crimebusters
Episodes.Plot: An unconscious war widow and her lifeless infant are found in the rubble of a bombed army recruitment center; Jack McCoy is forced to make one of the most unpopular decisions of his career.
Episodes.GuestStars: MacKenzie Mauzy, Christian Camargo, Michele Pawk, Amelia Campbell, Lisa Emery, Scott Sowers, Judith Hawking, Brian J. Smith

Episodes.Title: Rapture
Episodes.Plot: The creator of a religious website is murdered and the trail leads to a corrupt charitable organization.
Episodes.GuestStars: Libby George, Thomas Galantich, Bridget Siegel, Sam Breslin Wright, John Christopher Jones, Joshua Burrow, Daoud Heidami, Scott Johnsen, Alexis Suarez, Casey Groves, Stacy Shane, Lindsay Campbell, Brian Berrebbi

Episodes.Title: Bailout
Episodes.Plot: As detectives investigate the death of a bank executive's mistress, they uncover a kidnapping and extortion plot.
Episodes.GuestStars: Andy Gardner, E.J. Bonilla, John Ventimiglia, Michael Gaston, Kevin Corrigan

Episodes.Title: Take-Out
Episodes.Plot: The search for a writer's killer leads detectives to a closed espionage case.
Episodes.GuestStars: Neal Jones, Michael Esper, Monica West, Keith Carradine

Episodes.Title: Anchors Away
Episodes.Plot: A murdered television news reporter was investigating allegations that a billionaire Wall Street investment adviser was a fraud, but figuring out who killed her proves to be difficult

Episodes.Title: Promote This!
Episodes.Plot: Detectives Kevin Bernard (Anthony Anderson) and Cyrus Lupo (Jeremy Sisto) investigate the case of Oswaldo Morales (guest star Hector Javier Munoz), an illegal immigrant found unconscious but still alive on a service road. When the detectives find a possible link to Oswaldo's attack and nine recent bias-related incidents, they uncover a deep-seeded, dangerous bias against Hispanic men within the community.

Episodes.Title: All New
Episodes.Plot: Firefighter Thomas Cooper and his wife Linda are tortured and murdered in their new townhouse. The murders are thought to be linked to an old unsolved drug case, but then the detectives learn about a firefighter named Nick Spence, who had just joined Cooper's company and was being severely hazed. The investigation suffers a setback when Spence dies in a fire under suspicious circumstances.

Episodes.Title: Exchange
Episodes.Plot: Two engaged scientists die in a fire and their mentally challenged neighbor is injured while trying to help them. The detectives discover that the couple was stabbed before the fire and this leads them to a disturbed and extremely jealous woman.
Episodes.Writer: Luke Schelhaas, Ed Zuckerman, Stephanie Sengupta

Episodes.Title: Skate or Die
Episodes.Plot: Detectives Lupo and Bernard investigate a serial killer who targets homeless men and discover that a copycat may be at work.

Episodes.Title: The Drowned and the Saved
Episodes.Plot: A prominent charity executive is murdered and claims of stalking and blackmail surface during the investigation.
